title: Creamy Turkey a la King
ingredients: ['1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '295ml water', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 small carrot, diced', '150g cooked turkey breast, shredded', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 bay leaf', '80ml sherry', '60ml double cream', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '100g frozen peas', '1 tablespoon butter']
